originalText.text: Perfect! Professional! Impressive! and Fun!  My whole family and I are new patients, and this is the best doctor and the best office we have ever been to!  Lifelong patients now!  ALSO I always notice that Dr. Lambert's staff are so happy.  I came in this week and noticed they were all prepared for a surprise birthday party for a staff member.  So cute and so fun!  Thank you !

originalText.text: From the moment I walked into Dr. Lambert's office, I felt I was treated with the utmost care and professionalism. It was my first time and I received a thorough examination. Dr. Lambert's dental assistant Leena gave me an amazing cleaning. I am so pleased with the dental work Dr. Lambert has done on my kids for years, I decided to try her myself. It was one of the most pleasant dental experiences I ever had.

originalText.text: Great dentist. I have been coming to Nicole for a few years. Clean, stylish office. Modern techniques and equipment.

text.text: Great dentist. I have been coming to Nicole for a few years. Clean, stylish office. Modern techniques and equipment.

originalText.text: Hadn't been to the dentist in an embarrassingly long time and was happy to find a place that didn't shame me for that (hah)! The staff at Lambert & co are super friendly and efficient, took care of all of my tooth issues with a lot of consideration and made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. I got a cleaning, x-rays, and filling - all great and easy experiences. Also so glad to see an all female staff!

text.text: Hadn't been to the dentist in an embarrassingly long time and was happy to find a place that didn't shame me for that (hah)! The staff at Lambert & co are super friendly and efficient, took care of all of my tooth issues with a lot of consideration and made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. I got a cleaning, x-rays, and filling - all great and easy experiences. Also so glad to see an all female staff!

originalText.text: I went to Dr.Lambert's office in Tribeca today and the experience could not have been better! From the minute I walked in I was greeted by 3 lovely ladies who were incredibly sweet and answered all my questions, and trust me I had many as I have had really bad dentist experiences in the past. After filling our the paperwork I met with my dental hygienist, who could not have been nicer and so so attentive. She did a wonderful job, I honestly think it was the best cleaning I've ever gotten! After the cleaning I met with Dr. Lambert and wow, all dentist fears are officially gone. Her laugh and upbeat attitude was so lovely it made the whole consultation a breeze. If you are looking to leave the dentist with a huge smile on your face... this is the place to go! :)
